content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) fueled by coal, currently working with a warning that the chest at drop position is full.
- Wooden Chests at positions (x=40.5, y=-83.5), (x=41.5, y=-83.5), and (x=42.5, y=-83.5) storing coal and iron plates.
- Transport Belt connecting the mining drill to the chests.

### Iron and Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=10.0, y=0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Wooden Chests at positions (x=7.5, y=-0.5), (x=2.5, y=0.5), and (x=12.5, y=0.5) storing iron plates and copper plates.
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=1.5, y=0.5), (x=3.5, y=0.5), (x=6.5, y=0.5), (x=8.5, y=0.5), and (x=11.5, y=0.5) waiting for source items.
- BeltGroup connecting various parts of the production line.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting with full inventory
- Ensure your inventory has enough space before attempting to extract items from chests or entities.

### Errors when extracting but being too far
- Move closer to the target entity before attempting to extract items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure the target tile is unoccupied before attempting to place a new entity.

### Errors when crafting without necessary resources
- Verify you have all required resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items.

### Errors when placing entities too far from player position
- Move closer to the intended placement position, ensuring the distance is within the allowable range.

### Errors when attempting to place wooden chests without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have crafted or acquired wooden chests in your inventory before attempting to place them.

### Errors when extracting items from chests that are full
- Regularly clear out chests to prevent blockages and ensure smooth operation of inserters and drills.

### Errors when attempting to harvest with full inventory
- Before harvesting, make sure there is enough space in your inventory to accommodate the harvested resources.
